form.contact: Do you want to add your language or ask something? Don't hesitate to contact us!
form.feedback: Your feedback is always welcome! Thank you very much
form.name: name
header.status-explanation-1: is completely open source and made by contributors all over the world.
header.status-explanation-2: Your translations can help more people utilize our secure, censorship-resistant service.
main.after-lokalise: Lokalise automates all the translation workflow and is very easy to use. You can find the simple 3 steps to start the translations as below.
main.before-lokalise: You can translate the Status app and website into your language with
main.contact-explanation: Do you have any questions? Don't hesitate to contact us!
main.step1-1: In the language cards above, click a link you want to contribute (e.g. Status app translation) and sign up for Lokalise.
main.step2-1: You will find a project that needs your help. Check out the progress and click 'WORDS TO DO (new words)` or 'UNVERIFIED (updated words)'.
